javaxipc30
Class Section

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javaxipc30.Section
public final class Section
extends java.lang.Object

A Section represents a section of a MemSys shared memory segment, specified by the id of the memory segment, an offset, and a length.

See Also:
Xipc.MemListBuild(javaxipc30.Section), Xipc.MemListAdd(javaxipc30.MidList, javaxipc30.Section), Xipc.MemSectionBuild(int, int, int)

Constructor Detail

Section

public Section(int Mid,
               int Offset,
               int Size)
Constructs a new Section object. An alternative to the Xipc.MemSectionBuild() method.

Parameters:
Mid - An integer memory segment id, obtained via MemAccess or MemCreate.
Offset - The position within the segment at which the Section begins.
Size - The length of the Section.
Method Detail

getMid

public int getMid()
Accesses the memory segment id for the Section.

Returns:
The memory segment id of the segment that this Section belongs to.

getOffset

public int getOffset()
Accesses the offset value for the Section.

Returns:
The position at which the Section begins within the segment.

getSize

public int getSize()
Accesses the size, in bytes, of the Section.

Returns:
The length of the Section.

          int offset)

unpack
